title: Raising S*aves on the Other World While on a Journey - Novel Updates
tags: Dungeons   Female Protagonist   Game Elements   Overpowered Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   R-15   Skill Assimilation   S*aves   Sword And Magic   Transported to Another World
author: Eto   Etomaru   えと丸
description:
My name is Miyamoto Mai. Today is the day I will start my adventure in new popular VRMMO Infinite Dungeon Online aka IDO, after finally creating my character with unpopular class and skills Im suddenly transfered to different world. Finally an exciting life-or-death adventure awaits me.

At least that was what I thought, but what is with these cheats!?>
